author: IGN
description:
In this Hollow Knight: Silksong boss gameplay, we take on the Double Conchflies in the Blasted Steps. You'll only need to destroy one of the enemies to win this fight.

Loadout:
Crest: Hunter
Throwable: Longpin
Ability: Silkspear
Tools: Druid's Eye, Weavelight, Flintslate, Compass, Magnetite Brooch

For more info on Hollow Knight: Silksong, head to our wiki @ https://www.ign.com/wikis/hollow-knight-silksong

#HollowKnightSilksong #Gaming #IGN
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Boss Fight - Double Conchflies (Blasted Steps)

author: IGN
description: Not brave enough to take on one of Borderlands 4's vault bosses by yourself? We got you. Join us as we head into the Vault of Inceptus and delve in to find the guardian that protects the loot within. With recent reports of Borderlands 4 performance issues across the board for PC players, we decided to load the game up on an Nvidia RTX 5090 to put it to the test. We'll let you decide if the performance we're getting out of the 5090 in Borderlands 4 is justified. The settings are at maximum, or Badass in Borderlands 4, with frame generation turned on.
title: Borderlands 4 Vault Boss Gameplay on RTX 5090 - 4K, Max Settings

author: IGN
description: Randy Pitchford is on the offensive when it comes to Borderlands 4 PC performance. He spent the weekend responding directly to complaints on social media to Claptrap back at disgruntled fans. Plus, Rockstar has some particularly grand hopes for Grand Theft Auto 6, with the developer referring to its upcoming project as "the largest game launch in history."
title: Gearbox CEO Claps Back At Borderlands 4 Player Complaints - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: The Aqua Arsenal Punisher costume is coming to Marvel Rivals. Check out this Marvel Rivals trailer for the superhero team-based PVP shooter game for a peek at what to expect. The Aqua Arsenal Punisher costume and the Invisible Woman Azure Shade costume will be available in Marvel Rivals Season 4 from September 18 at 7 PM PDT / September 19 at 2 AM UTC to October 17 at 2 AM UTC.
title: Marvel Rivals - Official The Aqua Arsenal Punisher Costume Trailer

author: IGN
description:
A Game Scoop! fan writes in saying the original Gears of War was probably the last time he was surprised at how good a game can look and feel. He wants to know: "When was the last time the Goose Camp counselors were truly surprised at something a game could do or show you?" Let's discuss.

This is a clip from the full episode of Game Scoop! 824, available wherever you get your podcasts.
title: The Last Time a Game Truly Surprised Us - Game Scoop! Clip

author: IGN
description:
In this Hollow Knight: Silksong boss gameplay, we take on the double Moss Mother fight within Weavenest Atla. Since this is a rare fight where getting hit only takes away one piece of health, stick to the far left or right side and feel free to tank some hits while always continuing to build your silk destroying the small enemies.
Loadout:
Crest: Hunter
Throwable: Longpin
Ability: Silkspear
Tools: Druid's Eye, Warding Bell, Flea Brew, Compass, Magnetite Brooch

For more info on Hollow Knight: Silksong, head to our wiki @ https://www.ign.com/wikis/hollow-knight-silksong
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Boss Fight - Double Moss Mother (Weavenest Atla)

author: IGN
description:
The Mist in Hollow Knight Silksong is a location unlike any other in the game: There’s no map, the path towards the exit is randomized, and there’s a secret way to find your way through. If you don’t know it, you’ll likely just be stuck here for eternity. Here’s everything you need to know about navigating The Mist. 

0:00 - Intro
0:27 - How to Find The Mist
1:20 - How to Get Through The Mist
2:25 - What Comes After The Mist?
title: How to Get Through The Mist in Hollow Knight: Silksong

author: IGN
description:
Legendary Pictures, Warner Bros.  Pictures and Saga Arts are digging up a Halloween treat too good to miss — Trick ‘r Treat, is for the first time ever, newly restored in 4K and back on the big screen with partner Fathom  Entertainment, the leading specialty distributor of content to theatrical partners worldwide, for a special, long-awaited nationwide re-release of the horror classic on October 14 and 16, 2025. 

For two nights only, die-hard fans and curious newcomers will have the chance to relive the frights, the laughs, and the twisted traditions of this cult favorite. Plus, audiences will get bonus content straight from writer/director Michael Dougherty himself!

Since its release, Trick ‘r Treat has grown into a modern Halloween classic—part horror anthology, part cautionary tale, and 100% wicked fun. At the center of it all is “Sam,” the mischievous spirit who punishes anyone who dares to break the rules. Sam’s lasting impact has made him one of the top-selling Halloween icons
title: Trick ‘r Treat - Official Theatrical Re-Release Trailer (2025) Brian Cox, Anna Paquin

author: IGN
description: Get another look at Militsioner in this trailer for the upcoming Kafkaesque immersive sim. Every move you make is being followed by a Colossal Policeman. Anger, flatter, disappoint, deceive or even romance him to escape. Militsioner will be available on PC, and the Steam playtest ends on September 18, 2025.
title: Militsioner - Official Playtest Trailer | Critical Reflex Direct 2025

author: IGN
description: Check out the SCP: Valravn teaser trailer for this upcoming horror FPS game. You never lose a war, when war is what you sell. Infiltrate the Valravn Corp. Put down the horrors in the dark. Containment is not enough. SCP: Valravn will be available on PC.
title: SCP: Valravn - Official Teaser Trailer | Critical Reflex Direct 2025

author: IGN
description: You’re sick. So is the city. Explore a crumbling Terminal that loops when you die. Solve cursed investigations. Weaponize your symptoms. Find the truth, or spiral with it. Watch the Heavy as Stone teaser trailer for this upcoming detective exploration horror game. Heavy as Stone will be available on PC.
title: Heavy as Stone - Official Teaser Trailer | Critical Reflex Direct 2025

author: IGN
description: Dive into the grim world of Pioner in this new trailer for the upcoming post-apocalyptic MMO shooter game. The latest Pioner trailer showcases gameplay, including a peek at a mix of story-driven missions and competitive PvP encounters, along with the environments and ruined world of Tartarus Island. Pioner will be available on PC in 2025, with console releases planned for a future date. An open beta for Pioner begins in October 2025 on Steam.
title: Pioner - Official 'Frontier' Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Gen V really hit the ground running in Season 1, and Season 2 doesn’t entirely continue that momentum right out of the gate. There’s certainly a jarring disconnect in the early episodes of Season 2, as the series steps back from the status quo teased last time around and returns to the traditional college setting. But the series only improves as it moves forward and deepens the drama for Marie and her circle of wannabe superhero friends. Season 2 weaves a cohesive narrative built around the idea of overcoming trauma and becoming something greater. It does so even as it introduces one of The Boys universe’s best and most compelling villains in Hamish Linklater’s Dean Cipher. The series once again proves there’s far more worth exploring in this twisted superhero universe than what The Boys can handle on its own. Check out IGN's full, spoiler-free review of the raunchy superhero series' sophomore season.

Gen V Season 2 stars Jaz Sinclair, Lizze Broadway, Maddie Phillips, London Thor, De
title: Gen V Season 2 Review

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Collection Announcement Trailer for RoboCop: Rogue City, a first-person action shooter based on the hit movie franchise developed by Teyon. Players can soon access one complete package of the RoboCop: Rogue City experience with the Collection iteration of the game, fitted with the core RoboCop: Rogue City, RoboCop: Rogue City Unfinished Business, and all game updates. The Collection version of RoboCop: Rogue City is launching on October 30 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#RoboCopRogueCityCollection #Gaming #IGN
title: RoboCop: Rogue City - Official Collection Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Dying Light: The Beast continues the story of Kyle Crane, protagonist of the first game. Catch up with his misadventures so far with our recap of Dying Light and its expansion, The Following. 
With Dying Light: The Beast, a continuation of the protagonist’s story from the original game, shambling onto console and PC in the very near future, it’s the perfect time to refresh your memory on Techland’s epic parkour zombie adventure, Dying Light, and its massive expansion, The Following. With ten years having passed since the original Dying Light, you’d be forgiven for being a bit foggy on the details. Lucky for you, IGN took impeccable notes, so here’s everything you need to know about Dying Light’s story before playing the upcoming sequel.
Oh, and this should go without saying, but spoilers lie ahead.

#IGN #gaming
title: Dying Light: Story So Far

author: IGN
description:
Get a fresh look at Roadside Research in this latest trailer for the upcoming 1 to 4 player co-op gas station simulator. Except you’re aliens. And undercover. Do very human things like restocking shelves while preparing for the invasion. Just don’t get caught. Roadside Research will be available on PC in 2025, and a demo is out now on Steam.

#RoadsideResearch #Gaming #IGN
title: Roadside Research - Official Demo Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Gameplay Update Trailer for Dungeons and Kingdoms, a medieval fantasy kingdom builder action RPG developed by Uncle Grouch Gaming. Players will set out to gather resources, hunt animals, and advance technology to establish a kingdom to rule the masses. Fight against gruesome enemies in dungeons in Dungeons and Kingdoms, coming soon to PC (Steam).

#DungeonsAndKingdoms #Gaming #IGN
title: Dungeons and Kingdoms - Official Gameplay Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out this creepy yet bite-sized gameplay for Digested, an upcoming bodycam survival horror game that has you evading a massive snake that wants to eat you alive! The demo for Digested is now out on itch.io, which tasks you with locating and destroying a collection of snake eggs! Can you escape this deadly maze, armed with only a map and a compass to guide your way through the creepy building?

Want to check out the demo for yourself? The link can be found here: https://digested.itch.io/digesteddemo

Developed by Karel, and published by DigiGhost Studios, Digested has a planned Steam release date of 2025 and is available to be wishlisted as well.

#IGN #Gameplay #Digested
title: Digested Gameplay - Survi-Vore Horror?!

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Accolades Trailer for Cronos: The New Dawn, a third-person horror survival game developed by Bloober Team. Players will embark on a thrilling journey as the Traveler. Fight unruly enemies, travel through time, and get to the bottom of an apocalyptic event that ended humanity's reign. Don't miss the latest trailer to garner the critical reception behind Cronos: The New Dawn, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, and GoG).

#CronosTheNewDawn #Gaming #IGN
title: Cronos: The New Dawn - Official Accolades Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'A Monument to Legends' 15th Anniversary Trailer for Halo: Reach, the sixth installment to the hit sci-fi action first-person shooter franchise developed by Bungie. Celebrate the iconic prequel to Halo: Combat Evolved as echoes of memorable lines from the game bring players back to a simpler time, 15 years ago, when Halo: Reach launched. Play Halo: Reach now in Halo: The Master Chief Collection for Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#HaloReach #Gaming #IGN
title: Halo: Reach - Official 'A Monument to Legends' 15th Anniversary Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Pilot the Power of Megazord with your squad and put an end to the swarm infestation on September 18! Drop in now and complete the remaining Rangers' Quests to help summon the massive mech to the Battle Royale Island.

#Fortnite #PowerRangers #Gaming
title: Fortnite - Official ‘The Power of Megazord’ Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the new Springsteen: Deliver Me From Nowhere trailer for this upcoming film starring Jeremy Allen White as Bruce Springsteen. The film also features Jeremy Strong as Springsteen’s long-time confidant and manager, Jon Landau; Paul Walter Hauser as guitar tech Mike Batlan; Odessa Young as Faye; Stephen Graham as Springsteen’s father, Doug; Gaby Hoffman as Springsteen’s mother, Adele; and David Krumholtz as Columbia executive, Al Teller. The film is directed by Scott Cooper from his adaptation of Warren Zanes’ book of the same name. 

Springsteen: Deliver Me from Nowhere chronicles the making of Bruce Springsteen’s 1982 “Nebraska” album. Recorded on a 4-track recorder in Springsteen’s New Jersey bedroom, the album marked a pivotal time in his life and is considered one of his most enduring works—a raw, haunted acoustic record populated by lost souls searching for a reason to believe. 

The film is produced by Cooper, Ellen Goldsmith-Vein, Eric Robinson and Scott Stuber. Tracey
title: Springsteen: Deliver Me From Nowhere - Official Trailer #2 (2025) Jeremy Allen White

author: IGN
description:
LEGO Voyagers is a very different kind of LEGO game than the licensed stuff we already know and love, but it’s a good kind of different. If only this mandatory-two-player-co-op adventure weren’t over so quickly... Reviewed by Ryan McCaffrey

#IGN #gaming
title: LEGO Voyagers Review

author: IGN
description:
You may know the song this trailer is set to, but we'll bet you've never heard it used to accompany an alien amusement park simulator where humans are tortured for entertainment. Enjoy the launch trailer for Mars Attracts! as it is now available in Early Access for PC. Check it out on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2760580/Mars_Attracts/

#IGN #gaming #MarsAttracts
title: Mars Attracts! Official Early Access Launch Trailer
